results.name: My silly little smash clone (Smash Bash 2)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: -d3d11 in steam launch options
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
